song.title: Lost in Moment (with Susanne Salomonsen)
song.info:
Times when the morning is bright but cold Whispers and shadows, the signs [...???] The mystics and theories about to unfold
Reason's ahead of you You've heard it all before You're not sure there is more And love shall now prove it's true Returning to the core What you're searching for Is there
There's no greater feeling; it is loosening my heart I'm turning into believing that [this right's?] about to start
Lost in the moment, in time unknown Feels like eternal to be on your own The mystics and theories should no longer hide, 'cause
Reason is there for you Though you've heard it all before Can be sure there is more And love will then prove it's true Just hold onto the core What you're searching for
Reason is there for you Though you've heard it all before Can be sure there is more And love will then prove it's true Just hold onto the core What you're searching for Is there
